{{pItem.caption}}

插件使用了第三方书插件，详细内容请查看官方文档： angular-ui-tree

树插件

插件demo如下：

插件代码如下：

                JS代码
                
                    //绑定树插件数据
                    $scope.treeData = [{
                        name:"湖北省",
                        value:"hubei",
                        collapsed:false,
                        children:[{
                            name:"武汉市",
                            value:"wuhan",
                            nodeType:"error",
                            check:true,
                            children:[{
                                name:"新洲区",
                                html:"<span class='sss' att='11'>新洲区<span>hah</span></span><input type='text' name='111'>",
                                value:"xinzhou"
                            },{
                                name:"阳逻",
                                value:"yangluo",
                                nodeType:"disabled"
                            }]
                        },{
                            name:"黄石市",
                            value:"huangshi",
                            children:[{
                                name:"市区",
                                value:"shiqu"
                            }]
                        }]
                    },{
                        name:"湖南省",
                        value:"hunan",
                        children:[{
                            name:"武汉市",
                            value:"wuhan",
                            nodeType:"error",
                            check:true,
                            children:[{
                                name:"新洲区",
                                html:"<span class='sss' att='11'>新洲区<span>hah</span></span><input type='text' name='111'>",
                                value:"xinzhou"
                            },{
                                name:"阳逻",
                                value:"yangluo",
                                nodeType:"disabled"
                            }]
                        },{
                            name:"黄石市",
                            value:"huangshi",
                            children:[{
                                name:"市区",
                                value:"shiqu"
                            }]
                        }]
                    }];

                    //树插件配置
                    $scope.config = {
                        checkNode:"checkNode",
                        activeNode:"activeNode",
                        name:"name",
                        children:"children"
                    };

                    //绑定选择树节点函数
                    $scope.checkNode = function(arrayCheckNodes){
                        console.log("选中树节点：",arrayCheckNodes);
                    };

                    //绑定聚焦树节点函数
                    $scope.activeNode = function(pNode){
                        console.log("焦点树节点：",pNode);
                    };
                
                Html代码
                
                    <gm-tree treedata="treeData" data-check = true data-icon = true config = "config"  showquery=true>

下拉树插件

插件demo如下：

插件代码如下：

                JS代码
                
                    //树插件配置
                    $scope.config1 = {
                        selectNode :"selectNode",
                        name:"name",
                        children:"children"
                    };

                    //绑定树插件数据
                    $scope.treeData1 = [{
                        name:"湖北省",
                        value:"hubei",
                        collapsed:false,
                        children:[{
                            name:"武汉市",
                            value:"wuhan",
                            nodeType:"error",
                            check:true,
                            children:[{
                                name:"新洲区",
                                html:"<span class='sss' att='11'>新洲区<span>hah</span></span><input type='text' name='111'>",
                                value:"xinzhou"
                            },{
                                name:"阳逻",
                                value:"yangluo",
                                nodeType:"disabled"
                            }]
                        },{
                            name:"黄石市",
                            value:"huangshi",
                            children:[{
                                name:"市区",
                                value:"shiqu"
                            }]
                        }]
                    },{
                        name:"湖南省",
                        value:"hunan",
                        children:[{
                            name:"武汉市",
                            value:"wuhan",
                            nodeType:"error",
                            check:true,
                            children:[{
                                name:"新洲区",
                                html:"<span class='sss' att='11'>新洲区<span>hah</span></span><input type='text' name='111'>",
                                value:"xinzhou"
                            },{
                                name:"阳逻",
                                value:"yangluo",
                                nodeType:"disabled"
                            }]
                        },{
                            name:"黄石市",
                            value:"huangshi",
                            children:[{
                                name:"市区",
                                value:"shiqu"
                            }]
                        }]
                    }];

                    //绑定选定树节点函数
                    $scope.selectNode = function(pNode){
                        console.log("焦点树节点：",pNode);
                    };
                

                Html代码
                
                    <gm-combo-tree treedata="treeData1" binddata="selectValue" config = "config1" showquery=true></gm-combo-tree>
